titles.title: Securities Fraud Fairness Act
A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9460)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 7/21/1994--Introduced. Securities Fraud Fairness Act - Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to declare that it is unlawful in connection with a securities transaction on a national securities exchange for any person to aid and abet the use of any manipulative or deceptive device or contrivance in contravention of the rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission.
